casebody.data:
COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE v. G. E. NICHOLSON. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE v. Oma M. NICHOLSON. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE v. J. B. McGAY. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE v. Bonnie McGAY. Nos. 4610-4613. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Feb. 3, 1953. Charles S. Lyon, Asst. Atty. Gen., and Charles W. Davis, Chief Counsel, Bureau of Internal Revenue, Washington, D. C., for petitioner. Joseph A. Hoskins, Kansas City, Mo., for respondents.

Before PHILLIPS, 'Chief Judge, and KNOUS, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Petitions to review docketed and dismissed February 3, 1953, 17 T.C. 1399, .on motion of petitioner, respondents consenting thereto.
